descriptions: Hi Medicare is a teleheath platform that is basically used for storing patient medical records, prescriptions, and for connecting users to health care provoders
Building Hi Medicare with Nuxt, TypeScript, Supabase, Postgres, Prisma
Worked with Backend developers, product designers, and project managers on series of projects
TCMP is a teleheath platform that connects users to doctors
I worked as a Full Stack developer in a team of five
Re-build TCMP website and dashboard with VueJs, NodeJs, ExpressJs, Knex, Supabase, Postgres
I worked on series of features on the platform
Wrote frontend and backend code for projects.
Created clean, well-documented custom code and updates
Debugged websites to identify and resolve potential problems
Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frontend frameworks to build top-quality code for diverse projects
